title: Ahiru no Pekkle no Sindbad no Bouken
synopsis: Pekkle re-creates the Adventures of Sinbad.

details.English: Pekkle in the Adventures of Sinbad
details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Adventures of Sinbad
details.Japanese: アヒルのペックルのシンドバッドの冒険

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Ganbare! Keroppooz
synopsis: Kerropi and his friends are hectored when they have fun in the playground. Both of them agree to have a baseball competition. During the exercise, Junk quits the team because of their argument. Will they lose finally?

details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Let's Play Baseball, Keroppi and Friends: Let's Play Baseball
details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴのがんばれ! けろっぴーず

title: Ahiru no Pekkle no Suieitaikai wa Oosawagi
synopsis: A new boy moves into Pekkle's town, and is trying his hardest to impress Lucy; however, Lucy isn't interested in him. Lucy makes Pekkle out to be a better swimmer than he really is, and the new boy challenges him to a swimming contest.

details.English: Pekkle in the Great Swimming Race
details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Great Swimming Race
details.Japanese: アヒルのペックルの水泳大会は大騷ぎ

title: Patty & Jimmy no Kimikoso Superstar
synopsis: Jimmy is having trouble with pitching a baseball; Patty finds a way to encourage Jimmy to do better.

details.English: Patty and Jimmy in You're a Superstar!
details.Synonyms: Patty and Jimmy no Kimikoso Superstar, Hello Kitty and Friends: You're a Superstar!
details.Japanese: パティ&ジミィの君こそスーパースター

title: Ahiru no Pekkle no Aladdin to Mahou no Lamp
synopsis: Pekkle re-creates the story of Aladdin and His Magic Lamp.

details.English: Pekkle in Aladdin and His Magic Lamp
details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Aladdin and His Magic Lamp
details.Japanese: アヒルのペックルのアラジンと魔法のランプ

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Yowamushi-ouji no Daibouken
synopsis: Keroppi is blamed for the tomfoolery of others during a movie. As he runs home crying he is struck by lightening and transported to another world--just like in the movie! There he meets a cowardly prince and the both of them go on adventure to learn about courage and sticking up for oneself.

details.English: Keroppi in the Adventures of the Coward Prince
details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Adventures of the Coward Prince, Keroppi and Friends: The Adventures of the Coward Prince
details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴのよわむし王子の大冒険

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Kero Kero House no Himitsu
synopsis: On a rainy day Keroppi and friends find their elders' old secret club house. But the house ends up being more magical than they thought.

details.English: Keroppi in the Frog's Secret House
details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Frog's Secret House, Keroppi and Friends: The Frog's Secret House
details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴのけろけろハウスのひみつ

title: Pochacco no Wakuwaku Birthday
synopsis: It's the day before Pochacco's birthday and he's skateboarding around looking for his friends. He hopes to have a grand party with them the next day, but they all seem busy!

details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Exciting Birthday, Keroppi and Friends: Exciting Birthday
details.Japanese: ポチャッコのわくわくバースデイ

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Tomodachitte Ii na
synopsis: A new kid moves to town for a short stay with his father. He's really good at playing the ocarina but difficult to befriend. A bird likes to listen to his music and when a storm arrives they all help the bird by placing it and its nest into a bird house; this helps them all form an everlasting friendship as he moves once again.

details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Let's Be Friends, Keroppi and Friends: Let's Be Friends
details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴの友だちっていいな

title: Ahiru no Pekkle no Hihou wo Sagase
synopsis: Pekkle and his friends find a treasure map that will lead them to a stone that will grant one wish, and they go on a treasure hunt.

details.English: Pekkle in Find the Secret Treasure
details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Find the Secret Treasure
details.Japanese: アヒルのペックルの秘宝を探せ

title: Pochacco no Ninjin Hata wa Oosawagi
synopsis: Pochacco and friends open up a carrot land together. One day, they find that all carrots are stolen by someone. Because of this event, they start to suspect each other. Who is the thief?

details.English: Pochacco in The Excitement at the Carrot Patch
details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Excitement at the Carrot Patch, Pochakko no Ninjin Hata wa Oosawagi
details.Japanese: ポチャッコのにんじん畑は大騒ぎ

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Dai Bouken
synopsis: When Pocapon's belly button gone missing, Keroppi, Den Den, and Ruby go to find it as without it he is unable to play the drums.

details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Big Adventure, Keroppi and Friends: The Big Adventure
details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴの大冒険

title: Santa-san to Tonakai Kuppi
synopsis: Santa is having a race to determine the ten reindeer who will pull his sleigh that year. Kuppi is a young reindeer who wants more than anything to pull Santa's sleigh, and he enters the race.

details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Santa & His Reindeer Kuppi, Hello Kitty and Friends: Santa and His Reindeer Kuppi
details.Japanese: サンタさんとトナカイクッピ

title: Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro - Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland
synopsis: An incarnation of the Peeping Life franchise covers Tezuka anime characters and Tatsunoko Production anime characters such as Princess Sapphire and Casshern.

details.Synonyms: Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland, Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro, Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland
details.Japanese: Peeping Life 手塚プロ・タツノコプロ ワンダーランド

title: Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro - Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland Specials
synopsis: 2 bonus episodes done as a part of the 100th Anniversary campaign video collaboration with Universal Studios. Episode 1 features E.T. and episode 2 features Jaws.

details.Synonyms: Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland Specials, Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro, Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland Specials
details.Japanese: Peeping Life 手塚プロ・タツノコプロ ワンダーランド

synopsis: 4 Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro - Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland episodes that did not make it to the official DVD.

details.Synonyms: Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland ONA, Peeping Life: Tezuka Pro, Tatsunoko Pro Wonderland ONA
details.Japanese: Peeping Life 手塚プロ・タツノコプロ ワンダーランド

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Tomodachi ni Narou yo
synopsis: Wink is a lovely snake. He is Keroppi's friend. Keroppi wants to introduce Wink to his other friends. His friends deem Wink is a dangerous animal. Will they accept him finally?

details.Synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Let's Be Friends, Keroppi and Friends: Let's Be Friends
details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴの友だちになろうよ

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Tomodachi wa Mahoutsukai
synopsis: Keroppi's friend who is a magician comes to visit. But a trio of bad frogs was following him and steals a bunch of presents. The magician decides that he must fight them with his own strength.

details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴの友だちは魔法使い

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Bikkuri! Obakeyashiki
synopsis: Keroppi receives a letter from a friend who is scared of an abandoned house in his new town. He and the gang go and visit him to help him feel more comfortable and overcome his fears. While exploring the house they run into some robbers and an apparition that doesn't seem to be what it is.

details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴのびっくり! おばけやしき

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Kyouryuu ga Deta
synopsis: While playing hide and seek, Keroppi and the gang find some dinosaur bones. With the village elder they dig out more and put the bones back together and find out it was a baby dinosaur. In the nearby museum there is a mama dinosaur on display and as night falls the baby dinosaur's skeleton comes to life in search of its mother. The gang tries to help it reunite it and the cries of the baby dinosaur skeleton animate the mama's skeleton. Once together again their souls ascend to heaven and both skeletons become displayed lovingly at the museum.

details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴの恐竜がでた

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Sora wo Tobetara
synopsis: While playing with a kite, a bird is injured during its migration. The gang seeks help from a local pilot to help the bird make its journey.

details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴの空をとべたら

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Sora Tobu Yume no Fune
synopsis: Keroppi and friends get special tickets to ride a flying ship at night to look at the constellations. Whether they dreamt the same dream or encountered it for real is up interpretation.

details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴの空とぶゆめの船

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Sanjuushi
synopsis: Keroppi version of The Three Musketeers.
background: Screened alongside Taabou no Ryuuguusei Daitanken and Hello Kitty: Mahou no Mori no Ohimesama at the third Sanrio Sekai Meisaku Eigakan theatrical road show.

details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴの三銃士

title: Kero Kero Keroppi: Hasunoue Town Kiki Ippatsu!
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴ はすのうえタウン危機一髪!

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Mitsubachi Daisoudou
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: けろけろけろっぴのミツバチ大騒動

title: Nerawareta Megami Tenshi Angeltia: Mamotta Ningentachi ni Uragirarete
synopsis: Based on the adult game by Syrup: Many Milk.  Demons are attacking earth, releasing a field that drives men to wild lust and absorbing the carnal energy that results in order to replenish their strength. Yuuri is chosen by Suzune-sensei to become an Angel Goddess and fight these creatures of darkness. When Suzune-sensei deems Yuuri capable enough to fight on her own, however, things begin to go horribly wrong. The demons have a new creature, capable of besting even an Angel Goddess. But the possessed men aren't the only ones who want her, and her own gym teacher turns out to be a bigger threat and pervert than she could have dreamed. But she's not the only one who's been compromised...!  (Source: H-Moe)

details.Japanese: 狙われた女神天使エンゼルティアー ~守った人間達に裏切られて~

title: Shin Seikimatsu: Yatsuto no Souguu
synopsis: In the corner of the universe, there was a small planet where creatures called men flourished. Doomsday finally looms near to this planet where destruction and creation have occurred repeatedly. The great king of terror appears from the sky and the mankind faces the end. "Encounters with that kind" is Director Yutaro Sawada's original stop motion animation. (Source: Anime Bancho)

details.Synonyms: Shin Seikimatsu Yatsuto no Sogu, End of the New Century: Encounters with that Kind, New End of Century Encounter with that Guy, Encounter with the Guy
details.Japanese: 新世紀末 奴との遭遇

title: One Piece: Cry Heart
synopsis: Episode 1: Fuyujima ni Furu Sakura Diligent animators took Banpresto's "One Piece Cry heart ~Fuyujima ni Furu Sakura~" (One Piece Cry heart ~The Cherry Blossoms That Fall on Winter Island~) line of crane game prize figures and created a five-minute stop-motion short. The short recreates the famous "Hiluluk's Cherry Blossoms" scene from Eiichiro Oda's manga and anime One Piece. Episode 2: Fuyujima ni Furu Sakura A stop-motion animated video for Banpresto's "One Piece Cry heart ~children's dream~" line of crane game prize figures. The short recreates the famous "Oath of Brothers" scene from Eiichiro Oda's manga and anime. Episode 3: Ace no Saigo (Source: ANN)

details.Synonyms: One Piece: Banpresto's "Cry Heart" Short, Fuyujima ni Furu Sakura, Children's Dream, Ace no Saigo
details.Japanese: ワンピース Cry heart～冬島に降る桜～

title: Seiken Tsukai no World Break
synopsis: Seiken Tsukai no World Break takes place at Akane Private Academy where students who possess memories of their previous lives are being trained to use Ancestral Arts so that they can serve as defenders against monsters, called Metaphysicals, who randomly attack. Known as saviors, the students are broken up into two categories: the kurogane who are able to use their prana to summon offensive weapons and the kuroma who are able to use magic. The story begins six months prior to the major climax of the series during the opening ceremonies on the first day of the school year. After the ceremony is over, the main character, Moroha Haimura, meets a girl named Satsuki Ranjou who reveals that she was Moroha's little sister in a past life where Moroha was a heroic prince capable of slaying entire armies with his sword skills. Soon afterwards he meets another girl, Shizuno Urushibara, who eventually reveals that she also knew Moroha in an entirely different past life where he was a dark lord capable of using destructive magic but saved her from a life of slavery. Can those whose minds live in both the present and the past truly reach a bright future? Delve into the complex world of Seiken Tsukai no World Break to find out!
background:
The anime adaptation for Seiken Tsukai no World Break was first announced in February of 2014 on the wraparound jacket of the sixth volume of the original light novel series.

The voice cast from the Drama CD reprise their roles for the anime.

details.English: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman
details.Synonyms: Seiken Tsukai no Kinshuu Eishou, Warubure
details.Japanese: 聖剣使いの禁呪詠唱〈ワールドブレイク〉

title: Gohan Kaijuu Pap
synopsis: A series of short, 30-second segments featuring Gohan Kaijuu Pap and various "side dish" monsters to produce delicious meals.

details.Synonyms: Rice Monster Pap
details.Japanese: ごはんかいじゅうパップ

title: Momoya x Peeping Life: Go en Desu yo! II
synopsis: A continuation of last season as Shiromeshi-kun continues his attempts at dating and finding refuge in Momoya food toppings.

details.English: Peeping Life: This Is Fate! II
details.Synonyms: Momoya x Peeping Life: Go en Desu yo! 2, Peeping Life: Go en Desu yo! Season II - Okawari -, Peeping Life: Go en Desu yo! Season 2 - Okawari -
details.Japanese: 桃屋×Peeping Life ご縁ですよ！Ⅱ

title: Kuroko no Basket 2nd Season NG-shuu
synopsis: Animated bloopers, based on the extra section of the original manga series, included with the BD/DVD series for Kuroko no Basket Second Season (both limited and normal editions).

details.Synonyms: Kuroko no Basket NG-shuu
details.Japanese: 黒子のバスケNG集

title: Peeping Life: Gekijou Original-ban
synopsis: The Peeping Life comedy anime series spawned five shorts for Japanese theaters. Each of the five shorts was running on the lobby monitors in T-Joy's theater chain for two weeks before being replaced by the next short. In Tokyo's Shinjuku Wald 9 cinema complex the shorts were run on the complex's actual theater screens. They were then included in the Peeping Life: The Perfect Emotion's DVD release.

details.Synonyms: Peeping Life Gekijou Original Han, Peeping Life Gekijou Original Ban, Peeping Life: Gekijou Original Han
details.Japanese: Peeping Life劇場オリジナル版

title: Appleseed Alpha
synopsis: Set in a different series of events, this story does not follow the previous Appleseed movie canon (despite being directed by the same director of the previous movies); it is an alternate story to their beginnings. Briareos is already a cyborg and did not become separated from Deunan to be later reunited in Olympus to join ESWAT.Appleseed Alpha depicts the early days of Deunan Knute and Briareos in the 22nd century, as they embark on a journey throughout dystopic ruins of New York in search of the city of Olympus. They are hired by Two Horns, the warlord of the ruined city, to eliminate bipedal combat machines. During the fight, they encounter Iris and Olson, both on a mission. Deunan and Briareos befriend them and decide to join their mission. Iris is tasked with preventing the malevolent cyborg Talos from capturing a secret weapon humans were building. Talos uses Iris to activate the gigantic war machine. (Source: Wikipedia)

details.Synonyms: Project Alpha, Appleseed α
details.Japanese: Appleseed Alpha

title: Shiroishi no Yousei Pichi
synopsis: Short promotional videos made for Shiroishi City in Miyagi Prefecture.

details.Synonyms: The Sprites of Shiroishi
details.Japanese: 白石の妖精ぴち

title: Terra Formars
synopsis: During the 21st century, humanity attempted to colonize Mars by sending two species which could endure the harsh environment of the planet to terraform it—algae and cockroaches. However, they did not anticipate the species' remarkable ability to adapt. Now in the 26th century, a lethal disease known as the Alien Engine Virus has arrived on Earth, and the cure is suspected to be found only on Mars. The problem is, Mars in the present is overrun by creatures known as "Terraformars," incredibly powerful and intelligent humanoid cockroaches that mutated from those originally sent to the planet.  The Annex I team, consisting of a hundred men and women genetically enhanced with characteristics of powerful organisms from earth, has been sent to Mars on a mission to find the cause of the Alien Engine Virus and to help cure humanity—signalling the start of the crew's fight for survival.

details.Japanese: TERRA FORMARS [テラフォーマーズ]

title: Terra Formars: Bugs 2-hen
synopsis: Adaptation of the Bugs 2 arc of the manga.

details.Synonyms: Terra Formars: Bugs2 2599, TERRAFORMARS OVA
details.Japanese: テラフォーマーズ　バグズ２号編

title: Lady Jewelpet
synopsis: Momona is an ordinary junior-high school student hailing from Jewel Land. At her cousin's wedding, she envies the bride, Lady Diana, due to the fact that she is marrying the cousin who she had a slight crush on. However, once she sees Lady Diana and her cousin together, Momona begins to like her, and accepts her as her cousin's bride. Just as Lady Diana is about to properly meet her and introduce herself, Momona is transported to a snowy place in Jewel Land where the ruler, Lady Jewel, is giving a speech to the Petit Ladies, girls who are chosen as Jewel Candidates to be the next Lady Jewel. Momona meets her partner and mentor, Ruby, a white rabbit, who will guide her through the tasks in becoming Lady Jewel. Whoever passes the most tasks wins and becomes the next Lady Jewel, but standing in her way is Lillian, a girl who also aims to win the title of Lady Jewel, so she can choose her brother, Cayenne, to be her King alongside her. Momona soon also begins to fall in love with Cayenne, yet Lillian doesn't want her to get too close to him. Cayenne also seems to harbor feelings for Momona, but who will be chosen in the end as Lady Jewel to decide it all? And will Momona and Lillian ever become true friends and will Cayenne and Momona ever be together? (Source: Wikipedia)

details.Japanese: レディ ジュエルペット

title: Dragon Ball Z: Summer Vacation Special
synopsis: One peaceful afternoon, the Son family and friends are spending the day out on the town shopping in West City. Meanwhile, two strangers enter the city and begin causing havoc, destroying nearly everything in their path. As the Son family is eating, the building they're in is suddenly attacked, as it turns out the two are after Son Goku. When Goku sees that innocent people are being attacked in his name, he becomes furious. Trunks comes to Goku’s aid, and the two lead the artificial humans out of the city. As the battle is moved elsewhere, Goku and Gohan, now dressed in white tuxes, return and land in West City. The two proceed to show clips and highlights from the preceding Dragon Ball and Dragon Ball Z movies. Goku of course doesn't much like being all dressed up, and by the end he powers up to change back into his typical dōgi. Gohan tries to do the same, but isn't powerful enough to get out of his tux. Goku says he’ll get there someday, and Gohan tells everyone to be sure to go see “Extreme Battle!! The Three Great Super Saiyans” in theaters. (Source: Kanzenshuu)

details.Synonyms: Kyokugen Batoru!! San Dai Sūpā Saiya-jin　Supesharu, Kyokugen Batoru! ! San Dai Chō Saiyahito Supesharu, Extreme Battle!! The Three Great Super Saiyans – Special, Dragon Ball Z: Movie Overview Special
details.Japanese: 極限バトル!!三大超サイヤ人　スペシャル

title: Dragon Ball Z: Zenbu Misemasu Toshi Wasure Dragon Ball Z!
synopsis: In this film, which is believed to take place some time around the 25th World Martial Arts Tournament, Gohan and Goten are having a hot bath outside in the middle of winter. Goku (who is still dead) suddenly appears in front of his sons with the help of his Instant Transmission, and joins them in the tub. While there, the three Saiyans reflect back on the events that occurred during the Cell Games. Inside the house after Chi-Chi appeared, Goku tells his sons about Pikkon and the Other World Tournament. Later, the four members of the Son family appear dressed nicely. Gohan says that the adult division of the Tournament will begin this next year (in 1994), and the special comes to an end. (Source: Dragon Ball Wikia)

details.Synonyms: Looking Back at it All: The Dragon Ball Z Year-End Show!, Zenbu Misemasu Toshi Wasure Doragon Boru Zetto!
details.Japanese: 全部見せます 年忘れドラゴンボールZ!
